Desc.eng: A stack of notes. This must be the draft of a new volume.
Let's see… "In order to turn the Chimera into a loyal Guardian, the prospective master must defeat it in a special Circle of Combat . If he or she fails, the creature is set free."
I don't care about the failed attempts. Please go on.
“If anyone enters a Circle of Combat, the spell recognizes the contestant and summons a new Chimera."
We must find this Circle of Combat immediately. I want a Chimera. I will call it Fluffy.
I don't understand this. You have already defeated that great Chimera in a circle like this. Where is my Fluffy then?
